title: looking for a team. casual/serious.
body: I am a friendly casual player looking for a team to help me get back into the game. i am willing to play serious{{champion:91}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:236}} or just casual{{champion:35}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:115}} matches. i am low elo but will hopefully stand up against higher elo players. i main top/support but i can fill if needed. i am a very friendly player and have TS/skype if needed. so if you can invite me to a team or if anyone reading this wants to make a team. just send me a message in game. or reply to this post.
